topic.title: Response Odometer Reading Organizer - conformance rules

lines.i: Collection of odometer readings at various points in an EMS crew's trip

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.97"

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10626)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Beginning Odometer Reading (CONF:10630)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Beginning Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.171)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10627)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response On Scene Odometer Reading (CONF:10634)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response On Scene Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.172)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10628)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Destination Odometer Reading (CONF:10638)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Destination Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.173)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10629)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Ending Odometer Reading (CONF:10642)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Ending Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.174)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type x_ActClassDocumentEntryOrganizer
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode with data type ActMood
Contains exactly one [1..1] statusCode with data type CS

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10626)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Beginning Odometer Reading (CONF:10630)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Beginning Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.171)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10627)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response On Scene Odometer Reading (CONF:10634)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response On Scene Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.172)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10628)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Destination Odometer Reading (CONF:10638)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Destination Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.173)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component (CONF:10629)
This component SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Response Ending Odometer Reading (CONF:10642)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Ending Odometer Reading (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.174)

body.codeblock: <organizer xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.97"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1940947733"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2014"/> <high value="2014"/> </effectiveTime> <component> <observation> <code code="1187658808"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="1864423007"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="1994124987"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> <component> <observation> <code code="635902919"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation> </component> </organizer>
